item.title: EU Covid certificate decoder
item.description: A small little webtool that allows you to read out the information stored in your EU Covid certificate (Green Pass).

item.title: Neural Style Transfer
item.description:
In Neural Style Transfer, artifical neural networks are used to combine two images, such that the result has the content of one but the style of another image.

I go through the basic concepts and mathematical formulatins and also provide a working codebase for you to try.

A gallery with some of my proudest results is provided at the end :).

item.title: Mandelbrot images
item.description:
In this post we look at the fampus mandelbrot set.

I implemented it both in C++ and Python and provide some complexity considerations.

Finally, I built dashboard that allows you to interactivelu explore the set and create beautiful animations.

item.title: Implementing a calculator from scratch
item.description:
This project came out of an interview task I once had to complete.

The goals is to implement a fully working calculator, without using any of the standard libraries.

The calculator is able to accept arbitrary string that represent and expression or equation and solve it.

item.title: Password Hash Cracking
item.description:
I’m taking a look how user-authentifications works.
We will dive a bit into hash functions
Finally, we try to recover passwords from leaked hashes using GPUs.
Addittionally, I’ll provide some complexity considerations as well as cost estimations.

item.title: Sudoku Solver
item.description:
You can use the Sudoku Solver whenever you are stuck on a puzzle.

It can read a playing field either directly via webcam or by uploading a picture and quicklu provide you with the solution.

item.title: Why I quit my job at Google
item.description:
In this post, I go over my main motivation for leaving my job at Google.

Getting into this company was a long dream of mine, and I had worked years to get there, so the desicions was not easy.

I am hoping that my experience will help other developers making career desicions.
